name: Dream Catcher (itch) (MelissaL, januspetale, maddy !!, IJakonI, Endocrine/BAMSc, quitefabolous)
name_original: Dream Catcher (itch) (MelissaL, januspetale, maddy !!, IJakonI, Endocrine/BAMSc, quitefabolous)
description:
Finally you get to be the sandman and catch all the bad dreams of the sleepers at the campsite.

But be careful, because the forest demons are everywhere. They will hunt you relentlessly until you finally give all the sleepers a nice dream.

Movement control

WASD

Sword control

  • Mouse / Strike direction
  • Left Mouse Button / Strike
  • Right Mouse Button / Dash

Used assets:

-AStar Pathfinding

-Jazzcreatebubble Font SDF

-Fantasy Wooden UI (Asset Store)

-Stone UI (Asset Store)

-Sounds/Music from different sources
